content: this is a free pattern on my blog at http //www thefriendlyredfox com/2017/12/mountain-ridges-crochet-hat-free-pattern html you can purchase the ad-free printable pdf here that also includes the messy bun version which is not found on the blog this free crochet hat pattern has been a long time coming i have wanted to make a matching hat ever since i made the ribs an ridges scarf but a few tries ended up in my wip pile until i finally decided to try again and i am so so happy with the result the mountain ridges crochet hat made me think of getting a christmas tree up in the mountains so that is what i name it sizes toddler child teen and adult worked from the top down you will need to know how to crochet around the post a video tutorial is provided
